website_summaries.verdict: It’s hard to find a meat treat that's as natural and as packed with vitamins, minerals, and essential enzymes as these freeze-dried venison liver bites.
pros: Made with a single ingredient: venison liver
cons: The raw meat diet isn't for everyone

customer_reviews.title: UGH  (Reviewed by Moochie, the Cat)
customer_reviews.text: My owner, in her loving attempt to provide me with delicious treats, purchased these. I cannot quite describe the taste, but it does not have a familiar or pleasant taste.. Perhaps, if it were my nature to bring down an elk in the wild, I might have been used to the flavor. Now, if they could provide me with freeze-dried mouse I would be all over that! Maybe my fellow felines will have a different opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Graham

customer_reviews.title: New fav
customer_reviews.text: My very picky cat loves these pieces of freeze dried turkey liver. I am somewhat hesitant to give her liver (or me for that matter.) Not my favorite organ. Since it is supposed to be a treat, she doesn't get much at a time.
customer_reviews.author: ccp

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, good price
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, good price, fast shipping, but my cat just doesn't like them. I am surprised as he is on a limited ingredient diet, including venison, due to food allergies. He sniffs and licks these but hasn't actually eaten one after several weeks. Lucky for me the dog enjoys them, nothing wasted.
customer_reviews.author: P. French

customer_reviews.title: Favorite treat!
customer_reviews.text: Bought a bag of these for my daughter’s cat in a pet store and she went CRAZY for them. Was thrilled to find them on Amazon...now I can easily ship them directly to my grand kitty out of state.
customer_reviews.author: Lori S.

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but good quality and cool with my cat.
customer_reviews.text: My picky cat actually eats these. The ingredients are clean and simple. The only downside is the cost and how much content settles to the bottom as powder - but I sprinkle that on her wet food. I’m ok with the cost if it means my car will eat it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Harrig

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t buy again
customer_reviews.text: My cat will eat them sometimes but there are a lot of really hard pieces in the bag that are going to waste. Other liver treats I’ve gotten are softer than these. I won’t but them again.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith B.

customer_reviews.title: More of a food topper than a treat
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived extremely crumbled. I expected it to be pieces that I could give to my cat as treats, but what I got was more of a powdered pulverized product more suitable as a meal topper. At least half of it was crumbled into a powder. My cat did enjoy the flavor though. Maybe it was just this instance that the shipping wasn’t great. Not sure, but I will not likely buy this one again.
customer_reviews.author: emdog

customer_reviews.title: Cats hated it
customer_reviews.text: My two cats are on a limited diet due to one of my cats having a chicken allergy, so they can eat venison. I thought they’d love these treats, but they both immediately rejected them.
customer_reviews.author: hamlin293

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: My cat has never liked fish. Loves these and asks for them. I am glad even though they seem a bit expensive. Will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: ccp

customer_reviews.title: Made from venison liver and nothing else
customer_reviews.text: One of my cats simply adored this product, the other two thought I was giving them a piece of trash! That and... the recommendation on the bag to wash my hands after feeding put me on edge a bit. If it's not safe for me, why am I giving it to my cats?
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia Gillespie

customer_reviews.title: My cat wouldn't eat it.
customer_reviews.text: My cat wouldn't eat it. She sniffed it and just looked away.
customer_reviews.author: Medusa333

customer_reviews.title: cat babies say it's not their favorite
customer_reviews.text: They just don't seem to fully like the taste. They will eat them though
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis S. Russo DC

customer_reviews.title: Poor shipping method
customer_reviews.text: Super product that out kitty loves. However, it arrives in a padded envelope which resulted in a crushed product. The treats were salmon powder instead of salmon chunks.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth A. Macaulay

customer_reviews.title: Cats LOVED them!
customer_reviews.text: 100% protein, so you know the taste is great & the cats seemed to really like the crunchy texture!
customer_reviews.author: Laura M

customer_reviews.title: My cat begs for this continually. I taught her ...
customer_reviews.text: My cat begs for this continually. I taught her to sit up because she loves this treat so much. My other cat won't touch it.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Wylie

customer_reviews.title: ... cat goes crazy for these treats and she doesn't like many treats
customer_reviews.text: My cat goes crazy for these treats and she doesn't like many treats.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: My kitties love this!!
customer_reviews.text: My two sphynx kitties love this treats, they go crazy just showing them the bag. Really good quality product too. Definitely will order again.
customer_reviews.author: Ennys Sotolongo

customer_reviews.title: Made my cat sick
customer_reviews.text: My cat ate 3 of these, then proceeded to vomit in 8 places throughout my tiny 2 bedroom house. I don't think he liked it.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy M

customer_reviews.title: I love that they dont have all the terrible ingredients other ...
customer_reviews.text: My ferret absolutely these!!!! I love that they dont have all the terrible ingredients other treats do!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Neither of my kittens wanted to eat it
customer_reviews.text: They are kittens so not super smart, haha, but they tried to play with it instead of eating it. I mixed it into their food then they are it, so not really the products fault probably, but I'll still likely buy a different treat next time that they will actually eat like a treat instead.
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: Piece is too small
customer_reviews.text: At the beginning, my cat love this treat, it does smell good I believe it tastes good as well. However, there are too many tiny pieces of treat left in bag after few days consume. And my cat denied to eat the tiny pieces. I don't know what to do with the left over treat, I can just throw them. Left over is almost half of the bag, feel like that's kind of waste. Considering only half of the bag can be eaten, I don't think it's value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: JQ

customer_reviews.title: Will be buying again
customer_reviews.text: I pick these up local and I’m glad that I did. My cats went crazy over these and I caught one kitty jumping down from my dresser running off with the bag of these in his mouth.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

product_meta.title: Sojos Natural Freeze-Dried Cat Meat Treats
product_meta.description: Style:NaturalCat| Flavor Name:Other| Size:1.25 ozIn 1985 two forward-thinking women from Michigan mixed up the First batch of Sojos in their own kitchen. Our First product, Sojos original, was based on the Teachings of Juliette de barnacle levy, considered the grandmother of Herbal medicine. This first-of-its-kind pre-mix was soon followed by tasty gourmet treats.
feature_bullets: Sojos Dog Food And Treats Are Made From Scratch With Real Ingredients
No Gmo'S. No Fillers Or Preservatives. Nothing Artificial

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
